### Programma del corso

#### Primo giorno

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(gt)
library(gtExtras)
library(tidyverse)

tibble(Orario = c("09:30", "09:45", "10:45", "11:00", "12:30",
                  "13:30", "14:45", "15:00", "16:00"),
       Tema = c("[Introduzione al corso](materials/intro.qmd)", "[Ricerca Riproducibile](https://phd-toolbox-course.github.io/2022_PhD_Toolbox_course/M4_RicercaRiproducibile.html#1)", 
                "Pausa", "[Quarto](materials/qi.qmd)",
                "Pranzo", "[Opzioni avanzate](materials/about.qmd)", "Pausa", 
                "[Hands-on project](materials/about.qmd)", "Fine giornata")) |> 
  mutate(Tema = map(Tema, gt::md)) |> 
  gt() |> 
  gt_theme_pff() |>
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_borders(
        sides = "bottom",
        color = "black",
        weight = px(3) # Increase the line weight under the 4th row
      )
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      rows = 4:5, # Target the row under which the line's width is to be increased
      columns = everything()
    )
  ) |> 
 cols_align(
   align = "left",
   columns = vars(Tema) # Align text to the left in the "Tema" column
  )
```
:::
